data.strFullDescription:
[p][b]A digging adventure in a Steam-powered Frontier…[/b]

SteamWorld Dig is an action-adventure game that mixes exploration, puzzle-solving, and mining mechanics. 

Set in a western steampunk-inspired world, you control a robot named Rusty, who embarks on a journey to uncover the secrets of a long-abandoned underground town. As you dig through the earth, you’ll gather resources like ores and gems, which can be used to upgrade your abilities and tools to help you go faster and deeper... 
[/p][p]But don’t think it’ll be that easy! As you descend into the depths, you’ll encounter a variety of enemies, environmental hazards and puzzles that will put you and your trusty pick-axe to the test.
[/p][p]
[/p][h2]Key Features[/h2][list][*][p]An underground world full of secrets, treasure and terror.
   [/p][/*][*][p]Captivating 2D hand-drawn environments.
   [/p][/*][*][p]Story-rich narrative with a colourful cast of characters.[/p][/*][*][p]Randomly generated and immersive mine maps.[/p][/*][*][p]Challenging and fun game-play.
[/p][/*][/list][p]
[/p][h2]Additions[/h2][p]Compared to the Nintendo 3DS version, this release has:
[/p][p]
[/p][list][*][p][b]HD graphics:[/b] Beautiful, high-resolution (1080p) graphics.
   [/p][/*][*][p][b]Gamepad support:[/b] Keyboard, gamepad - play the game your way!
   [/p][/*][*][p][b]Achievements:[/b] Completionists rejoice!
   [/p][/*][*][p][b]Eye candy:[/b] Animated character portraits, bloom filter and more! 
   [/p][/*][*][p][b]Trading cards:[/b] With a character set like this? Of course!
[/p][/*][/list]
data.strSnippet: SteamWorld Dig is an action-adventure puzzler with strong Metroidvanian influences set in the SteamWorld Universe. You’ll need to dig deep into the earth, gather resources to upgrade your tools and abilities, take on enemies, solve challenging puzzles and uncover the secrets to save a dying town.
